emodeldistance

Class DistanceCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • emodeldistance.DistanceCalculator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementDistance, MoveDistance, ValueDistance

    public abstract class DistanceCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class that MOMot uses to calculate the distance between two models.
    Author:
    Eugene Syriani

      • calculateDistance

        public final double calculateDistance(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject model)
        Calculates the distance from model to target model.
        Parameters:
        model - the input model
        Returns:
        a positive number, the lower the value the more similar the models are. 0 means they are an exact match.

      • calculate

        protected abstract double calculate(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject model)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Core distance calculation algorithm that is specific to the type of distance.
        Parameters:
        model - the input model
        Returns:
        the value of how distant model is from the target model
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the computation fails
